# helpAnchor

**Instance Property**

The HTML help anchor associated with the Print panel.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var helpAnchor: NSHelpManager.AnchorName? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to specify the anchor name in your Apple Help file. The string you assign should contain only the name portion of the HTML anchor element.

## Customizing the Panel

- **jobStyleHint**: The type of settings that the print panel displays.
- **NSPrintPanel.JobStyleHint**: Constants that specify job style hints for activating the simplified Print panel interface and setting the options to display.
- **options**: The current configuration options for the Print panel.
- **NSPrintPanel.Options**: Constants that specify options for configuring the contents of the main Print panel.
- **defaultButtonTitle()**: Returns the title of the Print panel’s default button.
- **setDefaultButtonTitle(_:)**: Sets the title of the Print panel’s default button.
